mapper.select: select t.KPI_CODE "KPI_Code",t.KPI_FULL_NAME "KPI_Name",t.KPI_DESCRIPTION "KPI_Desc",t.IS_MINUS, case t.LABEL_TYPE when 'D' then '日报' when 'M' then '月报' else '其他' end "Acct_Type",1 "KPI_Name_Length" from DMCODE_PUB.DMCODE_COMP_KPI_MAPPING t where t.IS_VALID='1'

select t.SUBJECT_CODE "Subject_Code",t.SUBJECT_NAME "Subject_Name",t.SUBJECT_DESC "Desc", case t.LABEL_TYPE when '1' then '日报' when '2' then '月报' else '其他' end "Acct_Type",1 "Subject_Name_Length" from DW_NEWQUERY_SUBJECT t
select t.ID "Report_Code",t.FILENAME "Report_Name", case t.LABEL_TYPE when '1' then '全部' when '2' then '全部' else '其他' end "Acct_Type" from DW_NEWQUERY_REPORT t
